author: dleslie
msg: Revised email address for Jacek Ambroziak.

author: dleslie
msg: Added faq from Gunnaluger Thor Briem on loading extension element/function classes in a servlet.

author: morten
msg: A small fix that will allow top-level elements of an unknown URI.
XSLTC now ignored the element(s), while it previously reported an error

author: morten
msg: Added a small fix that orders the expressions inside a union in such a way that
expressions with an attribute axis or attribute node type will be put first.

author: morten
msg: I added a flag to the compiler/Parser class that is set if the outermost element
in the stylesheet contains a definition of the XSL namespace. The parser already
has a global variable '_target' that is set if the stylesheet contains a
<?xml-stylesheet?> PI or not. The compiler will now flag an error if neither
flags are set after the whole XSL/XML input document has been parsed.
